00038 VistaSaParser::HeaderListType VistaSaParser::parseHeader ()
00039 {
00040 
00041     using namespace boost::spirit;
00042     std::list< uint8_t > instream;
00043     data::FilePtr::iterator begin = m_filePtr.begin();
00044 
00045     bool parsed = qi::parse<data::FilePtr::iterator> ( begin, m_filePtr.end(),
00046                   qi::lit ( "V-data 2" )
00047                   >> ascii::char_
00048                   >> '{'
00049                   >> *ascii::char_
00050                   >> '}',
00051                   instream );
00052     BOOST_FOREACH ( std::list<uint8_t>::const_reference g, instream ) {
00053         std::cout << g ;
00054     }
00055     std::cout << "end" << std::endl;
00056 
00057 }
